Contributor: Wilson, W. N., artist.; Victory Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "W.N. Wilson." Date based on date of Victory Liberty Loan Campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that thousands of the boys who fought in the war will be coming home during the Victory Liberty Loan. To show them how proud you are, buy with every dollar you can spare and pledge every dollar you can save.  Illustration shows returning  soldiers coming down a ramp. This is a design for a newspaper advertisement.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: We did our part of the job!
Source: From: We did our part of the job!
